# DeMoD Nixpkgs

**Beautiful Package Management for Nix**

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
[![Nix Flakes](https://img.shields.io/badge/Nix-Flakes-blue.svg)](https://nixos.wiki/wiki/Flakes)
[![Made by DeMoD LLC](https://img.shields.io/badge/Made%20by-DeMoD%20LLC-00d4ff.svg)](https://demod.llc)

A modern, elegant Terminal User Interface (TUI) for discovering, managing, and installing Nix packages with real-time search powered by the official NixOS API.

## Code of Conduct

### Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to make participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

### Community Guidelines

1. **Be respectful** - Disagreement is no excuse for poor behavior or personal attacks
2. **Be collaborative** - Work together and help each other
3. **Be constructive** - Provide helpful feedback and suggestions
4. **Be patient** - Remember that people have different communication styles
5. **Be inclusive** - Welcome diverse perspectives and experiences

### Reporting Issues

If you experience or witness any inappropriate behavior, please report it by opening an issue or contacting the project maintainers.

## Support

- **Issues**: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/demod-llc/nixpkgs/issues)
- **Discussions**: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/demod-llc/nixpkgs/discussions)
